mapper.select: select md_question_id, md_id, member_id, member_nick, md_question_title, md_question_content, md_question_date, md_question_answer, md_question_type, md_answer_id, md_answer_member, md_answer_content, md_answer_date from md_question where md_question_id = #{md_question_id}

select count(q.md_question_id) cnt from md_question q, md m where q.member_id = #{member_id}
and q.md_id = m.md_id and m.md_name like concat('%', #{searchWord1}, '%')

select r.review_id, r.md_id, r.member_nick, r.order_detail_id, r.review_title, r.review_content, r.review_date, review_star , r.review_enable, m.md_name, m.md_thumbnail_path from review r, md m where r.md_id = m.md_id and r.member_id = #{member_id}
and m.md_name like concat('%', #{searchWord1}, '%')
and r.review_star like concat('%', #{searchWord1}, '%')
order by review_id desc limit #{limitNum}, 10

select m.md_thumbnail_path, w.wish_id, w.member_id, w.md_id, w.wish_item, w.wish_price from md m, wish w where w.member_id = #{member_id} and m.md_id = w.md_id order by w.wish_id desc limit #{limitNum}, 10

select m.member_id, m.member_name, m.member_email, m.member_pwd, m.member_nick, m.member_phone , m.member_addr1, m.member_addr2, m.member_addr3, m.email_agree, m.sms_agree from member m where m.member_email = #{member_email}
mapper.update: update delivery set post_code = #{member_addr1}, delivery_addr1 = #{member_addr2}, delivery_addr2 = #{member_addr3} where member_id = #{member_id} and isdefault = "1"
